forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. North wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 44, with temperatures rising to around 46 overnight. North northwest wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 38. North northeast wind 2 to 12 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
